title: S4 Ep10: Regulation after Wirecard
itunes:title: Regulation after Wirecard
description: It has been two years since Wirecard suddenly collapsed. Giorgio Barba Navaretti and Alberto Pozzolo explain to Tim Phillips why it is so hard to supervise global fintechs, and how regulators can do a better job next time.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
